website_summaries.verdict: Chic set to mix and match in  upscale shades.
pros: The gender neutral patterns mixed with a classic damask suits all occasions and gift recipients
Many customers found craft uses for this paper, too
cons: A few people think the paper is a little thin

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am a loyal customer of Kraft and I have purchased similar gift wrapping products to this before, but today when I opened up the package I was beyond disappointed. The colors are dull and ugly, not nearly what they appear to be in the photo included, and I wish that I’d bought different wrapping paper with the money I’d paid to this company. The paper tears easily when you try to fold it and all around feels like cheap craft paper. And on top of it, I tried to contact them and received no response.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Georges

customer_reviews.title: Nice paper for non-holidaywrapping needs
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the quality of the wrapping paper. I would say that from a color perspective, it's a little more natural/tan colored than pictured. This suits my need perfectly as I am dressing it up with a nice smokey blue bow or purple bow depending on the recipient. Nice paper for non-seasonal wrapping needs. Can be masculine or feminine depending on the accessories. Opaqueness is sufficient to not show the package details underneath.
customer_reviews.author: gh383

customer_reviews.title: Short Rolls of Paper
customer_reviews.text: So, while these are really cute, make sure you pay attention to how much paper is on the roll. It might seem like a good deal if you are thinking they are the same as the rolls you would normally buy in the store, but they are very short rolls. These aren't going to last me through more than one or two birthdays.
customer_reviews.author: A Girl And Her Dog

customer_reviews.title: Love it! ❤️
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly the type of wrapping paper I was looking for our Christmas gifts. Each of my kids has their own design so I don't put tags in the gifts. It also keeps them guessing on which gift is theirs! The quality of the paper is excellent. Not to thick and not too thin (you can't see through it). I will order more again when in stock. It would also be great wrapping year round and any type of accent ribbon color works. Also nice for a man's gift wrap.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kelch

customer_reviews.title: Quality paper with warm, modern colors
customer_reviews.text: The paper cuts easily but is not so thin as to tear when wrapping. The colors are vibrant and modern with print that doesn't bleed at the edges. This is exactly the look I was going for, and the patterns are neutral enough that I can use all but one of them long after the winter holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Aram Vartian

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Used this to "wallpaper" behind my pantry shelves. It is great paper and will be perfect for lots of projects, not just wrapping gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Twyla Brown

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: So happy I found this! I normally use plain craft paper for wrapping our Christmas gifts. Then I dress it up and personalize it with higher quality cloth ribbons and handmade tags but this year I decided I wanted the same type paper but with a subtle print. The prints are classic and not overbearing and the weight of the paper is just the same as I normally use. I’m very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Florida GalTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Love these wrapping papers. The muted colors are so retro and the paper is really easy to fold (but not so easy that it wrinkles). I actually enjoy wrapping gifts now! We'll see how long that lasts...
customer_reviews.author: eg

customer_reviews.title: Different purpose, same beautiful paper
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a low budget craft project. I used spray adhesive on cardboard for a wall art thing. No bleeding, paper held up well and the colors are beautiful. The blues are great but the others are definitely more yellow/nude. I thought they'd be more gold. I've used the paper to wrap gifts as well and I got a lot of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Works but isn't a wow
customer_reviews.text: This kraft paper style wrapping paper is a thinner material than I was expecting. While it isn't as bad as the really cheap regular wrapping paper it still doesn't have any sturdy structure to make clean fold lines. I was still able to use it. I enjoy the alternative colours this style offers versus traditional wrapping paper. But I will probably not repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: C Dowless

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful paper!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this wrapping paper for baby shower gifts and I tie jute string around like a ribbon. I’ve had so many compliments on how my gifts look like a professional has wrapped them. I love the thickness and that it doesn’t wrinkle easily. Makes it easier to fold and wrap, too.
customer_reviews.author: jtina206

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Tape doesn’t stick well to it and wasn’t using cheap tape. Spent a long time wrapping and it still didn’t look nice at end because tape kept popping off. I wouldn’t buy again. When I contacted seller they said try more expensive tape.
customer_reviews.author: sarah a.

customer_reviews.title: The paper is gorgeous and perfect for my Etsy Business
customer_reviews.text: I received this 24 hours after purchase! The paper is gorgeous and perfect for my Etsy Business. :-) It's thin Kraft paper with gorgeous prints on all 6 rolls you receive. Perfect for any gift giving occasion. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Why do they make wrapping paper that tape doesn't stick to?  WHY?
customer_reviews.text: This wrapping paper would be awesome IF TAPE ACTUALLY STUCK TO IT. As it is, you better tie it down...
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Blennerhassit

customer_reviews.title: Colors wrong/subpar quality
customer_reviews.text: The colors are not consistent with the picture. The khaki is darker (almost a brown). And it’s not good wrapping paper. Too thin to make nice crisp folds. I was very disappointed and wished that I had read the negative reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Red Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: It is purple not pink
customer_reviews.text: Wow nice... i bought this paper not knowing if it was going to work i like to mach my Christmas tree with my gift raping but it was perfect and very good price
customer_reviews.author: morena

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: This paper is great looking and great quality. My extremely high maintenance sister actually like it so much she made my sons unwrap their gifts very delicately so she could collect the used paper to take home. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Shoard

customer_reviews.title: Quality and heavy duty!
customer_reviews.text: Thick and study paper-made with quality. I like to use twine and Leobro 24PCS Handmade Natural Burlap Flowers (available on Amazon) for the present bows. I just tuck the edge under the twine so they can reuse them. :)
customer_reviews.author: Happy camper

customer_reviews.title: Quality and heavy duty paper!
customer_reviews.text: Thick and study paper-made with quality. I like to use twine and Leobro 24PCS Handmade Natural Burlap Flowers (available on Amazon) for the present bows. I just tuck the edge under the twine so they can reuse them. :)
customer_reviews.author: Happy camper

customer_reviews.title: Elegant, strong, and diverse
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully crafted paper. Will not tear easily, so if you're traveling as I am for the holidays, you don't have to worry about torn paper on presents on your destination. All colors of bows, ribbon, and any other embellishments look beautiful on the paper.
customer_reviews.author: MarLee Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfect for a school project!
customer_reviews.text: We used this wrapping paper for a school project. It worked perfect! The matte finish allowed us to glue pictures to the paper without a problem. The best way to describe the paper is it feels like a brown paper bag. Paper is heavy and did not tear. I would definitely recommend this wrapping paper!
customer_reviews.author: Candra

customer_reviews.title: Great paper
customer_reviews.text: A hair more expensive than average wrapping paper but looks nice, is recycled, and can be used for literally any occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kathalynas

customer_reviews.title: Good for Nothin’
customer_reviews.text: I was really disappointed in this wrapping paper; very thin, tape has a difficult time sticking to it, and it’s just difficult to work with. There aren’t even any cutting lines!
customer_reviews.author: Shiann Dobalo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Wrapping Paper
customer_reviews.text: This made my holiday wrapping simple and beautiful! All of the varying designs under the tree made it look like I had everything professionally wrapped - something my guests asked me about more than once! Would definitely recommend and I'm planning on buying more for next year!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: Less thick than the others of the same brand, found it ripped more easily than the black and pink versions.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice wrapping paper
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and looks great. All my gifts match now which is awesome and there is plenty to last till next Christmas. I can use these for any holiday or special occasion.
customer_reviews.author: eur0tr@$h

customer_reviews.title: Classy look for any occasion!
customer_reviews.text: This wrapping paper can be used for any occasion. One of reasons for selecting it. Very classy and nice variations to choose from when you may have more than one gift for a person/family. There's variance, yet consistency in choices when they are grouped together.
customer_reviews.author: GL

customer_reviews.title: Love the designs!
customer_reviews.text: These go so well together or separate. The paper is a typical brown paper which I find easy to cut and wrap with. The result is a well wrapped and cohesive set of gifts. The price is a smidge high (hence the 4/5 stars), but I will be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: MissTearyUs

customer_reviews.title: Really nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Recipients keep commenting on how much they like this paper. We're really pleased with how versatile and high-quality it is.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with the colors
customer_reviews.text: The colors contrast is much lower than what is shown in the picture. They definitely don’t pop. The pink looks almost purple.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bear

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for fans of old school christmas stuff, you should use stronger tape meant for wrapping paper though as this is a bit stiffer than you're average cheap paper.
customer_reviews.author: Cobalt Crimson

customer_reviews.title: not the same quality
customer_reviews.text: this is my 2nd time buying this paper because i was very impressed with the first batch - it was nicer/heavier paper, and it was nice to wrap things with. But this time, the paper quality if very poor. I am not satisfied with the lack of quality. Very disappointed. I wish I can return, but unfortunately opened it.
customer_reviews.author: jules

customer_reviews.title: Just like the photos!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this wrapping paper, looked just how it does in the photos.. I just wish each roll came with more paper but that’s my only complaint! I would get it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Moon

customer_reviews.title: Different design.
customer_reviews.text: Love these papers. Not a ton on the rolls though. All look cute with navy ribbon
customer_reviews.author: Erik Emerson

customer_reviews.title: Great all-purpose paper
customer_reviews.text: Really great wrapping paper that's sturdy and even though it's patterned, the pattern is subtle enough that it's really quite neutral.
customer_reviews.author: Frankincense

customer_reviews.title: Just be aware
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 5 stars however, the blue colored ones are great, but I was hoping the white ones would be more white. They’re more of a yellow color. So if you don’t want them to be white then this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, thick wrapping paper for many occasions!
customer_reviews.text: This wrapping paper is lovely! It's nice and thick, which is important when trying to cover a gift. The assortment is nice and I can use them with just about any occasion. Nice paper at a decent price!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny M

customer_reviews.title: Good value, high quality paper
customer_reviews.text: The paper folds nicely and the patterns range from elegant (on craft paper background) to subtle and casual.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Brown,Janice Brown

customer_reviews.title: Has a shine to it
customer_reviews.text: It has a nice shine to it, only except I was expecting a matte finish and kind of paper bag feel to it like it looks in the pictures. If you want shiny kraft paper, this for you.
customer_reviews.author: Ry

customer_reviews.title: Love this paper!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this paper! it's not too thick, not too thin. Creates a nice looking package!
customer_reviews.author: MaryJo Sokolowski

customer_reviews.title: Great paper
customer_reviews.text: This wrapping is beautiful and fairly sturdy! I bought the package of 6 rolls and used one completely while barely cracking into another; will definitely use it for presents throughout the years until I run out; would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Tristen

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, versatile patterns...wraps well!
customer_reviews.text: Very lovely subtle patterns on good size rolls of very good quality wrapping paper...the pattern make this paper roll set highly versatile.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Pretty different
customer_reviews.text: Pretty, and different. Packing tape worked the best for us, as scotch tape would pop off occasionally. Careful of your box corners also if it is very dry when wrapping.
customer_reviews.author: TenLetters

customer_reviews.title: Nice craft paper!
customer_reviews.text: I love craft paper and the white designs are a nice touch. I add some tulle and package looks beautiful! I'll buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: LAS

customer_reviews.title: Great wrapping paper for many occasions
customer_reviews.text: Love this paper. Beautiful, classy, and easy to work with
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great wrapping paper
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors they have in wrapping paper and have order about 6 different sets.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Upchurch

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this paper
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this paper. I love being able to coordinate while wrapping gifts. And this paper is really thick and high quality. I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Adelle T

customer_reviews.title: SHOULD BE NO NEGATIVE REVIEWS
customer_reviews.text: KRAFT WRAPPING PAPER LOOKS SO NICE FOR GIFT WRAPPING ANYTHING !!! USED THREE DIFFERENT BRANDS OF TAPE WITH NO PROBLEMS ...
customer_reviews.author: MELLY Z

customer_reviews.title: Some patterns are burgundy, not blue
customer_reviews.text: The item describes blue wrapping paper but the ones that are dark blue (striped and floral) were actually a burgundy/wine color. I still like the wrapping paper though. I bought them with the intent of wrapping a large baby shower item (a pack and play) and i used a whole roll because the rolls are not that big. Either way 5 rolls are a good deal for $20.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Harvill

customer_reviews.title: High end look, great colors and designs.
customer_reviews.text: Great wrapping paper! Nice, thick, cuts well and gets lots of compliments! More purple than pink.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua S.

customer_reviews.title: Cute wrapping paper, but not a lot per roll
customer_reviews.text: Good quality wrapping paper, being true to color as shown on the product picture. However, I was disappointed with the AMOUNT on the rolls. It was much less than expected. There are no cutting lines on the back of this paper.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Meals

customer_reviews.title: Good multiuse paper
customer_reviews.text: Very thick, nice paper. Great for wrapping or craft projects. Love that it doesn't tear on corners of boxes like cheaper papers would and it's so versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Mischa

customer_reviews.title: Love how well I was able tho wrap presents!
customer_reviews.text: The thickness of this wrapping paper really allowed me to wrap my presents beautifully. The subtly of the design allows me to use this paper year round while also giving me the ability to add more color if desired with markers, ribbons, and bows.
customer_reviews.author: TemporarilyMe

customer_reviews.title: Nice price
customer_reviews.text: The wrapping paper is not super heavy duty, but will hold up to my horrible wrapping skills.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Some paper purple not blue
customer_reviews.text: The paper is pretty but I was surprised to see the colors were more purple than blue.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Great Wrapping Paper
customer_reviews.text: Nice alternative to the super thin and fragile traditional paper I am used to. It's a cool take on wapping paper.
customer_reviews.author: gEoFFTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: High end look, great designs
customer_reviews.text: Great wrapping paper! Nice and thick, cuts well and gets lots of compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua S.

customer_reviews.title: Do not use rafia with this paper
customer_reviews.text: I love the paper, however, the rafia I used has some type of oil that makes the paper look oily where it has touched.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: This is great wrapping paper to have.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice wrapping paper. It has some weight to it like construction paper. It's not flimsy at all. Good for those precise wrap jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Sly Cann

customer_reviews.title: Good quality paper, lovely colours.
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged and lovely colours, just as the photos showed online. Good quality paper too, does not tear to easily, have actually used some to line a few shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: I Love This Wrapping Paper!
customer_reviews.text: My friends & family love receiving gifts wrapped in this paper. I just tried to re-order the rolls and they are not in stock--bummer. I hope that Amazon gets more of this wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: jk55

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and style
customer_reviews.text: Great wrapping paper for a variety of occasions. They compliment and contrast each other well.
customer_reviews.author: Kylerg

customer_reviews.title: good paper
customer_reviews.text: I like this paper. Why is wrapping paper so expensive?
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Cascaddan

customer_reviews.title: this paper is awesome. The rolls aren't huge
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this paper is awesome. The rolls aren't huge, but the paper quality is great. I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Fennell

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive, heavy duty wrapping paper. I wrapped ...
customer_reviews.text: Very impressive, heavy duty wrapping paper. I wrapped all my Christmas gifts in these, and it was probably the least stressful wrapping night I've ever survived. And the patterns are so bold, the presents look very striking if you go the extra mile and add some ribbon. I'd absolutely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Moonydg

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality wrapping paper
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely horrible paper...scotch tape just does not stick to it. The paper itself feels very cheap quality. Useless for us.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful quality paper
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful quality paper. Used for all my XM gifts with silver, gold, and red ribbon. Made the packages under the tree look uniform and festive!
customer_reviews.author: Trinity

customer_reviews.title: but I still love this wrapping paper
customer_reviews.text: The two pink wrapping paper rolls are actually a little more on the magenta side, but I still love this wrapping paper. The only downsides are there aren't any cutting grids and the paper is a little thin.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Everybody loves it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect wrapping paper!!! You can tell when you start wrapping its not a low quality product. We had everyone saying how they loved our wrapping paper. I told them where they can get it, and they brought it up on their phone, and ordered it right then and there!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I used one of these as "wallpaper" to dress up my workstation. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really Pretty--Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Used to wrap my boyfriends valentine gifts and they look so nice now yay
customer_reviews.author: Doooooo

customer_reviews.title: Good quality paper
customer_reviews.text: Good quality paper, not thin or easily torn. However the colors are kinda dull.
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa S.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color wrap sent
customer_reviews.text: Received a package that had wrap that was many colors not the plain advertised black and white. Sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M

customer_reviews.title: Cute paper
customer_reviews.text: Not a lot of paper per roll but for the price it was worth it. The paper is wood quality and has cute designs.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Greenwood

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Pretty paper. It's thick so it doesn't tear as easily during wrapping. Colors are more muted than the photos make them seem, they are more of a kind of washed out pastel color in person. I didn't have any trouble sticking regular scotch tape to the paper like other reviewers seem to have experienced.
customer_reviews.author: Valeska Lichner

customer_reviews.title: Very satisified
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice thick wrapping paper. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: renemarie

customer_reviews.title: Great paper!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the pastel colors and received the black and white, which I actually ended up liking more! I just wish there was more paper to each roll.
customer_reviews.author: Mobower

customer_reviews.title: Nice paper
customer_reviews.text: I love this paper! Awesome for gift wrapping and I also used this paper to cover old books to display in my book shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Jill F Barim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality heavy duty paper and stunning designs. Print is a little darker than pictured. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Rory

customer_reviews.title: Cutest paper for price!!
customer_reviews.text: I always get compliments on this paper!! I love the variety of designs and the simplicity.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Umlauf

customer_reviews.title: Cute paper
customer_reviews.text: Not a ton of paper per roll but was worth it for the price, cute designs and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Greenwood

customer_reviews.title: Nice & big rolls
customer_reviews.text: Nice & big rolls, so I was able to use it with a large package. Used the Indian henna looking roll for a bridal shower gift, & got complimented on it.
customer_reviews.author: Danalyn

customer_reviews.title: I love to wrap gifts and make a beautiful paper bow ...
customer_reviews.text: I love to wrap gifts and make a beautiful paper bow with the paper. This will make nice packages.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, simple paper. Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful subtle prints-I used mine for bulletin board background in my prek class.
customer_reviews.author: jenelle

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sturdy paper with nice designs. I was worried because a review said tape didn’t work well but mine was just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. I love them and will order again. You can use for all seasons and its very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful designs and good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this paper for my Christmas look. I’m very particular about matching so craft paper with ribbons and bows in the colors for my theme each year make it look that much more appealing for me.
customer_reviews.author: Brynn Seever

customer_reviews.title: Nice wrapping paper
customer_reviews.text: Nice wrapping paper. They all coordinate so it's nice to mix and match if you have multiple items to wrap.
customer_reviews.author: Caito

customer_reviews.title: Great paper!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, sturdy wrapping paper. I don't even see this thickness at Christmas time. The patterns are great. I'll be back!
customer_reviews.author: RealRoses

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this paper! High quality, matte finish and plenty on each role.
customer_reviews.author: Raine Surmonter

customer_reviews.title: Great Paper.
customer_reviews.text: This paper is stunning. However it's a little more dull than pictured. It still worked though as there are patterned that carry over for birthdays.
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: Great Wrapping Paper
customer_reviews.text: They have great colors in wrapping paper and love all the different colors that I have ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Upchurch

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and holds up well.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. Sturdy paper. Easy to use and holds up well. Thicker than expected, I was pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Milani

customer_reviews.title: FUN PAPER!
customer_reviews.text: I love the variety and the look. Definitely recommend, but because it's kraft paper tape doesn't always stay - I had to use a lot of tape.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Price

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Paper is good quality & the prints are very cute
customer_reviews.author: lkayp7

customer_reviews.title: It worked out beautifully. Quality paper
customer_reviews.text: Used this wrapping paper paired with gold decorative tape. It worked out beautifully. Quality paper. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just a little too thin for the price
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful paper, but I wish it could be a bit thicker for the price. Definitely suited my need...I didn't want traditional tacky paper for wrapping Christmas gifts, and this was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Greenbean

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality and great value
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality and great value! Colors are slightly more dull than pictured, but I am not disappointed! Came with enough or roll to wrap about three medium sized gifts, but that is around 18 total with the six rolls they give you.
customer_reviews.author: Online shopper

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't cut very well
customer_reviews.text: This is my first experience with non gloss paper and I found the wrapping paper difficult to use. Wasn't my favorite
customer_reviews.author: Passionfruit

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this paper! It's nice & thick & we can use it for pretty much any occasion with the right ribbon.
customer_reviews.author: lililTop Contributor: Pets

product_meta.title: Note Card Cafe Bella Kraft All Occasion Wrapping Paper | 6 Pack | 30 x 120 inch Rolls | Kraft Brown, White | for Birthdays, Weddings, Showers, Gifts, Holidays, Christmas | Recyclable, Biodegradable
feature_bullets: LOOKS GREAT! Add style to any occasion, the traditional brown Kraft makes it look elegant and neat. Choose from our wide range of colors and patterns. Patterns include Chevron, Casablanca, Damask, Diagonal Stripe, Geo Block and Polka Dots in white on kraft.
USE IT ALL YEAR LONG: Our versatile Kraft paper works great for birthday, Christmas and holiday gifts. It has the right thickness for wrapping, craft projects, and DIY
STOCK UP: Ensure you always have beautiful Kraft wrapping paper in hand for any occasion with our 6-roll bundle set. Each gift wrap paper roll is 30" wide and 10' long

SUPERIOR QUALITY: Each roll is high-quality industrial-grade 40# paper weight Kraft stock with colorful patterned prints. Resist humidity fairly well. Our paper is strong but smooth at the same time, easy to fold
GO GREEN: Kraft paper is 100% Recyclable and 100% Biodegradable
